title: World tour for model boat inspiring citizen science against environmental pollution - Northumbria University
summary: The Flipflopi project has created a model sailing boat made entirely from recycled plastics, aiming to combat single-use plastics and inspire communities globally. Supported by Northumbria University, the project recovered 135 tonnes of plastics and emphasizes cross-collaboration to address environmental pollution. The exhibition in Portugal showcases the versatility of plastics and encourages innovative solutions to reduce their consumption. The team promotes education and skill-sharing to further combat the problem of ocean plastics and to foster a circular economy.
green_innovation: TRUE: This is green innovation because it involves creating a product (the sailing boat) from recycled materials and promotes environmental sustainability by advocating against plastic pollution.
business_innovation: TRUE: This is a business innovation as it involves the development and introduction of a new product (the recycled plastic sailing boat) that significantly differs from previous products and contributes to a new business process relating to sustainable practices.
green_product: TRUE: This is a green product because the sailing boat is made from 100% recycled plastic, designed to reduce environmental impact throughout its lifecycle.
green_process: TRUE: This is a green process since it incorporates methods that minimize waste by recycling materials and using them creatively to build new products.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 339999 - All Other Miscellaneous Manufacturing, 541715 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences, 611310 - Colleges, Universities, and Professional Schools, 813312 - Environment, Conservation and Wildlife Organizations
greenwashing: FALSE: The article does not describe greenwashing, as the Flipflopi project appears to provide genuine solutions and innovative methods for addressing plastic pollution, backed by research and community engagement.
